name: planted.chicken
description: A spicy collaboration with NENI, featuring their legendary Jerusalem Plate seasoning blend.
longDescription: A match made in culinary heaven: Our beloved planted.chicken meets the iconic NENI spice blend from their legendary Jerusalem Plate. This collaboration brings Middle Eastern flavors to your kitchen with aromatic spices that transport you straight to the streets of Jerusalem.
ingredients: Water, pea protein, rapeseed oil, NENI spice blend (cumin, coriander, paprika, turmeric), pea fiber, natural flavoring, salt, vitamin B12
preparation: Pan-fry for 3-4 minutes on each side. Perfect in bowls, wraps, or served with hummus and fresh vegetables.
